categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: A squad in the Grand Army of the Republic was led by the clone trooper "Heater" during the Clone Wars. The squad was comprised of "Charlie," "Racetrack," and "Sync," troopers who had also previously deserted from the Republic. The squad was sent by Clone Commander CC-3636 "Wolffe" on a mission to destroy a Confederacy of Independent Systems weapons depot in order to either gain their freedom or redeem themselves to Republic service. The squad successfully destroyed the depot, and the troopers chose to return to the Republic.
